item.title: What Is Logic Design? A Beginner's Guide to the Brains Behind Hardware
item.description: Logic design is the blueprint of all digital systems. Learn what it is, how it works, and why it’s the foundation of everything from calculators to CPUs.

item.title: 🌍 10 Everyday Habits That Make Your Life More Sustainable
item.description: Want to live a more eco-conscious life without making radical changes? Start with these 10 simple habits that make a real impact.

item.title: 🌱 Sustainable Living at Home: Practical Tips for a Greener Lifestyle
item.description: Learn how to create a more sustainable home through composting, water conservation, eco-friendly decor, and growing your own food.

item.title: Digital Minimalism: Reclaiming Focus in a World of Distraction
item.description: Constant notifications, endless scrolling, mental clutter—sound familiar? Discover how digital minimalism helps you reclaim time, focus, and sanity in a hyperconnected world.

item.title: The Rise of AI-Resilient Careers: What Makes a Job Future-Proof?
item.description: As AI reshapes industries, certain careers stand firm. Discover the key traits of AI-resilient jobs and how to future-proof your career.
